features.name: Islamic reminders experience mode toggle
features.description: In the Islamic reminders dashboard, admins can switch between manual reading mode and visual media mode for adhkar and hadith content via buttons that trigger setExperienceMode, which updates UI state and persists sources (morning, evening, hadith) in the database.

features.name: User dashboard mobile sidebar behavior
features.description: On the user dashboard, the sidebar becomes a fixed off-canvas panel on smaller screens, and the floating sidebar toggle button is disabled in mobile view to avoid overlay issues while keeping the main content scrollable with adjusted padding.
